title: innum varavillaiyE en
sahitya:
innum varavillaiyE en idayattaik-koLLai koNDa kadir vaDivElan


anupallavi

  ennennamO pEshik-kanni manam karaittAn eNNAyiram kanivu maNNAnadE sakhiyE


caraNam    kavalaip-paTTup-paTTuk-kaNNIrilE tuLaindu kandan mayil mElEri vanda vazhiyaip-pArttEn
Avalai ninainduralai azhutti iDitta kathai Anaden mAnamum pOnadE SaNmukhan
